meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>relationship</kanji> <kanji>intervals</kanji>... this doesn't make much sense at first, but if you think about it, at certain intervals from within your friends, you'll run into someone who's your <vocabulary>companion</vocabulary>... not just any old friend. Something better. Something part of your group.
readingMnemonic:
The reading for 仲 is the one you learned. When you learned the kanji 間, we didn't give you a mnemonic for the (ま) reading, so here's one now:

Think through all your companions in your life. Imagine one of them is your <reading>Ma</reading> (ま). She's on your pirate crew, and a pretty awesome pirate.
